SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller.client

Interface ClientAction

All Known Implementing Classes:
RMIAction, SocketAction
public interface ClientAction
The ClientAction interface provides methods to notify server about a client side action Class that implements this: SocketAction, RMIAction

  • Method Details

    • access

      void access(String nickname, String pwd, boolean isRegistered)
      Notifies the login or the registration action
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname entered
      pwd - the password entered
      isRegistered - true if it is login, false if it is registration

    • reqLobbies

      void reqLobbies()
      Notifies the request of available lobbies

    • joinLobby

      void joinLobby(Integer idLobby)
      Notifies the choice of lobby action
      Parameters:
      idLobby - the id of lobby

    • createLobby

      void createLobby(int numOfPlayer)
      Notifies the lobby creation action
      Parameters:
      numOfPlayer - the number of player for new lobby

    • playInitCard

      void playInitCard(Integer idCard, boolean isBackSide)
      Notifies the initial card play action
      Parameters:
      idCard - the id of card
      isBackSide - the side of card

    • choosePersonalGoal

      void choosePersonalGoal(Integer idCard)
      Notifies the personal objective(goal) card choice action
      Parameters:
      idCard - the id of card

    • playCard

      void playCard(Integer idCard, boolean isBackSide, int[] position)
      Notifies a card play action
      Parameters:
      idCard - the id of card
      isBackSide - the side of card
      position - the position that client wants to play

    • drawCard

      void drawCard(LocationType location, Integer idCard)
      Notifies a card draw action
      Parameters:
      location - the LocationType
      idCard - the id of card

    • chat

      void chat(ChatMessage message)
      Notifies a chat action
      Parameters:
      message - the ChatMessage
